TODAY IS THE DAY! JOIN US AND DON‚ÄôT FORGET TO BRING YOUR FRIENDS üëèüèº‚ú®

We must defend Trans lives ALWAYS, but especially our Trans women of color and immigrants.... There is no pride in detention!! Come today to enjoy a street drag show, honor Victoria Arellano, Roxsana Hernandez y Johana Medina who died because of willful ICE negligence, and demand that the Biden administration #EndTransDetention üè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößÔ∏èüè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

¬°HOY ES EL D√çA! √öNETE Y NO OLVIDES LLEVAR A TUS AMIGOS üëèüèº‚ú®

Debemos defender las vidas de las personas trans SIEMPRE, pero especialmente a nuestras mujeres trans de color e inmigrantes. ¬°¬°No hay orgullo en la detenci√≥n !! Venga hoy a disfrutar de un espect√°culo de drag en la calle, honre a Victoria Arellano, Roxsana Hernandez y Johana Medina, quienes murieron por negligencia intencional de ICE, y exija que la administraci√≥n de Biden ponga #FinALaDetencionTrans üè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößÔ∏èüè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

item.title: Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement shared a quote.I just wanted to update folks to say HAPPY PRIDE!!!! We are so fortunate...
item.content:encoded:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement shared a quote.I just wanted to update folks to say HAPPY PRIDE!!!! We are so fortunate to be in community with you! In honor of our trans forebearers please consider sharing this fundraiser with your friends and family! We've been able to use your generous donations to send money orders for commissary and put fun...ds on the phones for dozens of transfolks imprisoned. With your help, we can keep them provided for until they are released into our loving embrace. See MoreThe Colorado Trans and Queer Asylum Fund welcomes and offers aid to f‚Ä¶ Jordan T Garcia needs your support for Support Transfolks in Immigrant Detention in CO

gofundme.com

Support Transfolks in Immigrant Detention in CO, organized by Jordan T Garcia

item.title: This fund is national and is intended to provide financial...
item.content:encoded:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

This fund is national and is intended to provide financial assistance for LGBTQ+ individuals applying for DACA for the first time. The applicant will be provided with legal services at no cost to them by a law firm and the check will be issued directly to USCIS as part of the application.

item.title: Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementFamilia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement was live.Ten years after the Dream Act failed in...
item.content:encoded:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementFamilia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement was live.

Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December 18, 2010, join us now for a virtual panel conversation with immigrant rights organizers and leade...rs as they share their reflections and, as we enter 2021, ask whether national leaders have learned the lessons of past failures.
Speakers:
- Erika Andiola
- Jorge Gutierrez
- Lizbeth Mateo
- Neidi Dominguez

item.title: Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December...
item.content:encoded:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December 18, 2010, join us for a virtual panel conversation with immigrant rights organizers and leaders as they share their reflections and, as we enter 2021, ask whether national leaders have learned the lessons of past failures.

Speakers:
- Erika Andiola
- Jorge Gutierrez...
- Lizbeth Mateo
- Neidi Dominguez

Live streaming on these FB pages:
- https://www.facebook.com/Familiatqlm
- https://www.facebook.com/ImmJusticeNetwork
- https://www.facebook.com/raicestexas
- https://www.facebook.com/NeverAgainAction

https://fb.me/e/484ma4Tgu

THU, DEC 17, 2020

Post the Dream Act...A DECADE LATER

item.title: üî¥ NOW: Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening Immigration...
item.content:encoded:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

üî¥ NOW: Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening Immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017.

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

cbsnews.com

Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.
